message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $9,000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,500. However, I'm willing to throw in a bonus feature that will add significant value to the product. If you're willing to meet me at $10,000, I'll include this bonus feature, making the overall value of the product even greater. It's a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
